headline: TJX Companies (TJX) is Jim Cramer’s Retail Winner Pick: “You Know What’s the Best? TJX!”
summary: We recently published a list of Jim Cramer Discussed These 12 Stocks. In this article, we are going to take a look at where TJX Companies, Inc. (NYSE:TJX) stands against other stocks that Jim Cramer discussed. On Thursday, Jim Cramer, host of Mad Money, described the 145% duty on China as so extreme that it […]
